local new = typesys.new
local delete = typesys.delete
require('services/player_info_services')
local game_events = require("module/game_events")
local event_system = require "manager/event"
local PlayGame = typesys.def.PlayGame {
    __super = typesys.Panel,
    Btn_PlayGame = typesys.__unmanaged,
    -- TextVersionNumber = typesys.__unmanaged,
    -- PlayGame_image_bg = typesys.__unmanaged,
    -- icon_logo = typesys.__unmanaged,
    Btn_PlayGame_image = typesys.__unmanaged,
    -- Image_start = typesys.__unmanaged,
    -- Image_wa = typesys.__unmanaged,
}

function PlayGame:awake()
    self:add_listeners()  
end

function PlayGame:start()
    --local PlayerInfoService = typesys.new(typesys.PlayerInfoService)
    --PlayerInfoService:logIn()
end

function PlayGame:add_listeners()
    self:add_listener(NetWorkEvent.LOGIN, function()
        -- todo
    end)

    self.Btn_PlayGame.onClick:AddListener(function()
        self:enter_game()
    end)

end

function PlayGame:enter_game()
    DoTweenBridge.DoTextScale(self.Btn_PlayGame_image.gameObject,1.2,1,function() 
        GameUIManager:OpenUI("LoadingScreen.prefab")
    end)
end

function PlayGame:destroy() 
    self:release()
end

return PlayGame
